channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: When a Stranger Calls
channel.desc: During a babysitting job, Jill, a young woman, is terrorised by a psychopathic killer's ominous calls. Years later, he returns to menace her once again.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Talladega Nights: The Ballad of Ricky Bobby
channel.desc: Ricky, a NASCAR racing sensation, is the number one racer in the world. After Jean beats him in a race and becomes the top racer, Ricky tries to regain his dominance.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Ultraviolet
channel.desc: A female rebel is infected with a virus that provides her with superhuman abilities. Thereafter, she tries to safeguard a boy in a futuristic world, who carries the virus's antigen.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.desc: Micky, a maths professor, enlists five gifted students to use their abilities to win millions at blackjack in Las Vegas. He exploits their talents for personal gain in the glamorous casino city.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: The Equalizer
channel.desc: Robert McCall gives up violence and wishes to lead a quiet life. However, brutal events force him to take up the fight for justice once again.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Premium Rush
channel.desc: Wilee is a bicycle messenger who rides a single-gear bike with no brakes. His routine delivery turns into a dangerous chase when his last package of the day is pursued by corrupt police officers.
